txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Completing 'Restoring the Three Kingdoms' will cancel this quest</rgb>
'You have done well, [placeholder]. It seems we shall have to be more vigilant in our watch of Eryn Lasgalen, so the Taurogrim can never again return.'

'I have received reports that more of the Taurogrim have revealed themselves. As I feared, they have returned to Tholkát in force.\n\n'Once more, I must ask that you defeat them or drive them off before they gain a new foothold.'
Taurogrim can be found in Tholkát in northern Eryn Lasgalen.\n\nYou should defeat Taurogrim in Tholkát.
Thranduil can be found in Felegoth.\n\nYou should talk to Thranduil.
Crawling out of the shadows of Eryn Lasgalen, the Taurogrim have returned to Tholkát in force.
